name: Historium VR - Relive the history of Bruges
description: The VR experiences takes the user on an immersive journey along the trading routes in the 15the century. You can sail, row, fly, explore and interact to learn about the history of Bruges!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 equivalent or higher Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 980 equivalent or higher Storage: 3 GB available space
